title: The Judgments and Awards (Reciprocal Enforcement) Act
title_en: The Judgments and Awards (Reciprocal Enforcement) Act

provisions.title: Section 1
provisions.content:
1. This Order may be cited as the Judgments and Awards (Reciprocal
Enforcement) (Nigeria) Order. 1956.
   2 It is hereby declared that the Judgments and Awards (Reciprocal
Enforcement) Act shall extend to judgments obtained in a Superior Court
in Nigeria (including a Superior Court in the Southern Cameroons) in the
like manner as it extends to judgments obtained in a Superior Court in
the United Kingdom.
              CIhc ineluston of thh pase h authorized by L.N. 4119761
